name: Bratricide
description:
Bratricide:

As the player, your job is to protect an ant colony from an evil little brat who has the power of the sun at his disposal. 

Watch out for poisonous foxglove flowers as you collect grapes to bring back to the anthill. 

Prepare yourself for all-out backyward warfare in this simple but addicting arcade-style game!

Controls:

Number 1 Key - Release a fire ant

Number 2 Key - Release a house ant

Number 3 Key - Release an army ant

Spacebar - Advance tutorial, close the box flap

Tips:

It's better to have lots of ants out at once so that the brat doesn't know where to focus.

Foxglove only grows in the shade (when the box flap is down and the magnifying glass is not out).
